id: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller
name: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller
shortDescription: The MADRIX NEBULA is your gateway to breathtaking LED pixel installations. This advanced SPI decoder connects directly to your LEDs, delivering high-quality signals over Ethernet or USB for seamless, vibrant visuals
description: Upto pixel perfect control of LED lights
Ethernet network or USB data communication
Quality output of 8 universes
License supports lifetime upgrades
Developed & made in Germany
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
produces image quality display

specifications.Ethernet: 2 x RJ45, Auto MDI-X, Daisy-Chain Support, 10/100 Mbit/S
specifications.Network Protocols: Art-Net (1,2,3,4, incl. ArtSync) Streaming ACN (sACN / ANSI E1.31)
specifications.USB: 1 x Port USB 2.0 Type-B, Female Socket

name: Nicolaudie® LED Stick DE3 DMX
shortDescription: The feature rich STICK-DE3 has been designed to provide a control solution for the most demanding of projects and yet easy enough for anyone to use. The controller integrates a graphical color display, allowing scene photos to be displayed. Easily view the selected zone, scene name and design without the need to navigate through complex menus.
description: New glass design with Graphical color display
Color/dimmer/speed palette
500 scenes, 10 zones
1024 DMX channels
USB & Ethernet connectivity
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
RS232, ports, infra red

specifications.USB: 1 x Port USB 2.0 Type-B, Female Socket

name: Madrix® LED software License Key
shortDescription: MADRIX 5 allows you to produce extraordinary live visuals. You don't need to invest a lot of time for programming. With MADRIX 5, you quickly create visuals and bring creative and diverse lighting effects to any LED installation. In addition, apply many advanced features you would not want to miss.
description: Upto pixel perfect control of LED lights
Supports DMX channels from 1024 to 1,048,576
Start, Entry, Basic, Professional, Ultimate, Maximum & programmer License options
License supports lifetime upgrades
Developed & made in Germany
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
produces image quality display from 128x128 to 2048x1024

name: Aluminim Profile - AL- OS - 01
shortDescription: DALUX® LED aluminium profiles are engineered for targeted lighting applications, delivering both function and style. Choose between standalone profiles with diffusers or pre-assembled options featuring integrated LED linear strips for quick and effortless installation. To complete your setup, a full range of accessories — including end caps, mounting brackets, and suspension links — are available to suit any installation need.
description: Excruted from high quality alumminium stock
Purpose designed extusions for specialised applications
Sturdy profile with correct gauge for application
Enhanced heat management increase LED light quality & life
Correct installation accessories for application
Custom color options available - MOQ & Lead times apply

name: Microwave motion Sensor-MW-1
shortDescription: Reliable automation starts with high-quality components, and our carefully selected sensors have consistently proven their durability and performance. Tested across numerous projects in Sri Lanka, they deliver dependable automation solutions you can trust.
description: This 5-meter flexible LED strip light provides a warm white glow, perfect for creating ambient lighting, under-cabinet lighting, cove lighting, or highlighting architectural features. It features high-quality LEDs, a strong adhesive backing for simple installation, and can be cut at marked intervals to fit your specific needs. Low power consumption and a long lifespan make it an energy-efficient choice.

name: Flexible LED Strip Light (Warm White)
shortDescription: Versatile and easy to install lighting for various applications.
description: This 5-meter flexible LED strip light provides a warm white glow, perfect for creating ambient lighting, under-cabinet lighting, cove lighting, or highlighting architectural features. name: RGBW LED Controller with Remote
shortDescription: Control your RGB and RGBW LED lighting with ease.
description: This RGBW LED controller allows you to manage your RGB and RGBW LED lighting installations with precision. The included remote control offers 20 preset lighting effects, color adjustment, brightness control, and speed control. It supports synchronization of multiple controllers and features memory function to recall your last settings after power off.

name: LED Recessed Downlight (10W)
shortDescription: Energy-efficient recessed lighting for modern interiors.
description: These 10W recessed LED downlights provide bright, even illumination for residential and commercial spaces. Their slim profile makes them perfect for areas with limited ceiling cavity space, while the white finish blends seamlessly with most ceiling designs. Each downlight delivers the equivalent light output of a 60W traditional bulb while consuming just 10W of power.

name: 12V DC LED Power Supply
shortDescription: Reliable power supply for LED lighting systems.
description: This constant voltage LED driver provides stable 12V DC output for powering LED strips, modules, and other low-voltage lighting. Its compact, lightweight design allows for flexible installation options, while built-in protections against short circuit, overload, and over-voltage ensure safe operation.

name: Modern LED Pendant Light
shortDescription: Elegant suspended lighting for dining areas and kitchens.
description: This modern LED pendant light features a sleek aluminum body with a matte black finish and a warm white light that creates a cozy ambiance. The adjustable suspension cables allow you to set the perfect height for your space, making it ideal for hanging over dining tables, kitchen islands, or in entryways.

name: Infrared Motion Sensor for Lighting
shortDescription: Automatic lighting control for energy savings.
description: This ceiling-mounted motion sensor detects movement using passive infrared technology and automatically controls your lighting for convenience and energy savings. It's perfect for hallways, stairwells, closets, garages, and other areas where hands-free lighting operation is desired.
